title: Sion & Bard bug.

embed.description: in this clip Sion charge hes Q and release it just as Bard ult lands and it takes no effect on sion this clip if for a bug report.

body: hi i have found a bug with Sion & Bard if you are  playing as sion and charge up you Q and release it as Bards ult hits Sion it will not take effects you can see this in the video.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This would be better posted under the [Report a Bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) over on NA, please be sure to read the [How to report a game bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) sticky thread before posting.
